website.title: wexCommerce - Open Source Single-Vendor Marketplace
title: wexCommerce
hero.title: A Modern Single-Vendor Marketplace
hero.description: Includes an SEO-optimized web storefront and a powerful admin panel for managing your online store.
about.title: Free, Cross-Platform, Open Source
about.description: wexCommerce is an open-source single-vendor marketplace licensed under MIT. It is fully responsive and works seamlessly across all modern devices and screen sizes.
features.title: Features
features.payment_methods: Multiple payment methods: Credit Card, PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay, Link, Wire Transer, Cash on Delivery
features.login_options: Multiple login options: Google, Facebook, Apple, Email
features.security: Secure against XSS, XST, CSRF, MITM, and DDoS attacks
features.sentry: Error monitoring and performance tracing with Sentry
demo.title: Try the App
demo.androidAppDesc: You can install the Android App by downloading the APK and installing it on any Android device.
support.title: Support
support.description1: If this project helped you, saved you time, or inspired you in any way, please consider supporting its future growth and maintenance.
support.description2: You can show your support by starring the repository (it helps increase visibility and shows your appreciation), sharing the project (recommend it to colleagues, communities, or on social media), or making a donation via:
support.closing: Open-source software requires time, effort, and resources to maintainâ€”your support helps keep this project alive, up-to-date, and accessible to everyone. Every contribution, big or small, makes a difference and motivates continued work on features, bug fixes, and new ideas.
githubIssues.title: Report Bugs & Request Features
githubIssues.description: Found a bug or want a new feature? Please help improve the project by opening an issue on GitHub.
contact.title: Contact Us
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of the wexCommerce website and services. By using this site, you agree to them.
terms.usageText: You agree to use wexCommerce lawfully and not to misuse its services or attempt to disrupt its operation.
terms.contentText: All content is provided "as-is" without warranty. We may update or remove content at any time.
terms.licenseText: wexCommerce is licensed under the MIT License. You are free to use, copy, and modify the codebase under the terms of this license.
terms.liabilityText: wexCommerce is provided as-is. We are not liable for any damages resulting from its use.
terms.changesText: Terms may change over time. Continued use of the site means you accept the updated terms.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how wexCommerce collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect data such as your IP address, browser type, and interaction with our site through services like Google Analytics.
privacy.usageText: We use collected data to improve our services, personalize your experience, and analyze website performance.
privacy.storageText: Your data is stored securely. We take appropriate measures to protect it from unauthorized access.
privacy.thirdPartiesText: We may use third-party tools like GitHub buttons or Google Analytics which may track user behavior. Please refer to their respective policies.
privacy.cookiesText: wexCommerce uses cookies to remember preferences and analyze site traffic. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
privacy.securityText: We take appropriate measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacy.rightsText: You can request to view, update, or delete your personal information. Contact us for any concerns.
privacy.changesText: We may update this policy. By continuing to use our website, you agree to the latest version of the policy.
